page.title: 10LANDUSE IN LOSCOE
page.content: The land surrounding Loscoe is mainly residential with a small farming area, and some industry. The residential side of the area includes most types of houses, alot of them privately owned, which covers most of the land. This stretches back as far as the opencast site. The opencast site has been there since 1981 and has spoilt quite alot of the landscape, which has made the area not very nice to live in. The dam has also been affected by the opencast site, and what use to be quite a nice place is now very dirty. The dam itself is quite large and was once the main water supply for the area.The industry includes Rydes Pork butchers and a small refuse site. Both are clean and well maintained. The farmland is mostly fertilised grassland with a small amount of home produce.
